revisions.rev: {{Beauty pageant |photo = [[Image:Ocean Park Manila Bay.JPG|200px]] |caption = [[Manila Ocean Park]] - The venue of Miss Philippines Earth 2010 | winner = | represented = | date = 24 April 2010 | presenters = [[Karla Henry]], [[Ginger Conejero]], and Alvin Alfonso ("VJ Alvey") | entrants = 49 | venue = Aquatica, [[Manila Ocean Park]] | broadcaster = [[ABS-CBN]] and [[The Filipino Channel]] }} '''Miss Philippines Earth 2010''', the 10th edition of the [[Miss Philippines Earth]] [[beauty pageant]], was held on April 24, 2010 at the Aquatica, [[Manila Ocean Park]], [[Manila, Philippines]].{{cite news|title=About Miss Philippines: Beauty Pageant with a Cause|url=http://www.missphilippines-earth.com/?page_id=5|publisher=Miss Philippines Earth official website|first=Lorraine|last=Schuck|date=2008-06-05|accessdate=2010-03-02}} Miss Philippines Earth is the largest and most widely participated beauty pageant in the [[Philippines]] with 49 official delegates participated in 2010. Miss Philippines Earth 2009 Sandra Seifert crowned [[Kris Psyche Resus]] from [[Infanta, Quezon|Infanta]] as her successor and represented the [[Philippines]] in the international [[Miss Earth 2010]] beauty pageant, was held in [[Vietnam]]. The event was aired by [[ABS-CBN]] in the [[Philippines]] at 9:00 in the evening on April 25, 2010 and was shown internationally via [[The Filipino Channel]]. Aside from the Miss Philippines Earth 2010 winner, four other equal winners were crowned. [[Angela Lauren Fernando]] was crowned as ''Miss Philippines Eco Tourism 2010'', ''Miss Philippines Fire 2010'' was [[Gwennaelle Ruais]], ''Miss Philippines Air 2010'' was [[Renee Rosario McHugh]], and ''Miss Philippines Water 2010'' was [[Emmerie Dale Cunanan]]. [[Carousel Productions]], the organizer of Miss Philippines Earth, changed the ranking of the runners up and winners since 2009. The judges selected 10 finalists who competed for the top five. The top five candidates vied for the grand crown (Miss Philippines Earth) and the four other equal crowns. The remaining five finalists who failed to advance in the top five served as the runners up of the pageant.{{cite news|title=NegOcc beauty queen is Miss Philippines Earth 2009|url=http://www.abs-cbnnews.com/entertainment/05/11/09/negocc-beauty-queen-miss-philippines-earth-2009|publisher=ABS-CBN News|first=Online|last=ABS-CBN News|date=2009-05-11|accessdate=2010-03-02}}{{cite news|title=2 Negrense beauties top pageant|url=http://showbizandstyle.inquirer.net/lifestyle/lifestyle/view/20090512-204488/2-Negrense-beauties-top-pageant|publisher=Philippine Daily Inquirer|first=Armin|last=Adina|date=2009-05-12|accessdate=2010-03-02}} ==Results== ===Placements=== {| class="wikitable" !
